util

Class SymbolTable<Entry extends IdEntry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.SymbolTable<Entry>

  • public class SymbolTable<Entry extends IdEntry>
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of all identifiers used in a Forrest application

        public void declareConst(ForrestTree t)
                  throws ForrestFireException
        Declare a constant
        Parameters:
        t - - the id of the constant
        Throws:
        ForrestFireException - if the identifier has been used already or if the constant is declared inside a nested scope

      • hasBeenUsed

        public boolean hasBeenUsed(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - - the id to check for
        Returns:
        true if the id has been used anywhere in the code up until now, false otherwise.

        Set the type for a ForrestTree node that is an identifier
        Parameters:
        id - - ForrestTree that needs its type set
        Throws:
        ForrestFireException - if the id has not been declared yet
